question: How to become a Pennie Certified Broker
text:
How to become a Pennie Certified Broker
          
        
Please visit 
Broker Certification (pennie.com)
 and review the Requirements to become a Pennie Broker. If you meet all the requirements, please select one of the buttons in the Blue "Which Training Should I Take? section depending on your training status. Follow the instructions on the page on how to get Certified with Pennie.
